alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 10:28PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tipton, northwestern Fayette and Shelby Counties through 1100 PM CST... At 1027 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southeast Memphis, or near Germantown, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Collierville, Germantown, Millington, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Ellendale, Dixonville, Downtown Memphis, Eads, Frayser, Midtown Memphis, Tipton, Atoka, Mason, Gallaway and Braden. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 1 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
